code_evaluation_json.title: Quiz for Meet Insurance Professionals and Customers

questions.question: Which roles are part of the insurance sector?
options: Customer service agents and administrative support staff
Central banking policymakers and bond market brokers

questions.question: Whatâ€™s the difference between captive agents and independent agents?
options: Captive agents sell products and services on behalf of adjusters. Independent brokers represent one insurance company.
Captive agents sell products for only one insurance company. Independent agents represent multiple insurance companies.
Captive agents and independent brokers both represent multiple insurance companies.
Captive agents and independent brokers both represent just one company.
It depends on the company and region.
